narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Graceful Living LLC is a Non-emergency Medical Transport (VAN) provider based in Westlake, OH. From 2018-01 through 2019-12, this provider received $406K in Medicaid payments across 6K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 92% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: T2025 (T2025). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2019-12, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
